TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelFactory`1<TChannel> implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public Interface IChannelFactory(Of TChannel) Implements IChannelFactory
generic <typename TChannel> public interface class IChannelFactory : System::ServiceModel::Channels::IChannelFactory

typeparam.name: TChannel
typeparam.span: 通道處理站所建立的通道型別。

span.span: The type of channel that the channel factory creates.

summary.span: 定義必須由通道處理站實作的介面 (該處理站會建立型別特有的通道)。

span.span: Defines the interface that must be implemented by channel factories that create type-specific channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作 合約可讓使用者建立特定型別的多個通道，而不需要每次都指定通道型別。Implementing the contract allows users to create multiple channels of a given type without having to specify the channel type each time. 換句話說，將通道型別定義為實作 介面之通道處理站的泛型參數也就表示，不需要將此型別傳遞到 方法中。In other words, defining the channel type as a generic parameter for the channel factory implementing the interface means that it is not necessary to pass the type into the methods. 如果使用者想要建立不同的通道型別，他們可以針對所需的每一個通道型別建立其他通道處理站。If users want to create different channel types, they can create additional channel factories for each type of channel required. 多載可讓您區分最初傳送訊息的目標位址以及最終目的地。The overload allows you to distinguish the address to which the message is initially sent from the ultimate destination. 如需定址的討論，請參閱[位址](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/endpoint-addresses.md)主題。For a discussion of addressing, see the [Addresses](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/endpoint-addresses.md) topic.

summary.span: 建立指向指定之端點位址的指定型別通道。

span.span: Creates a channel of a specified type to a specified endpoint address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 多載來區分最初傳送訊息的目標位址以及當您想要執行手動路由傳送時的最終目的地。Use the overload to distinguish the address to which the message is initially sent from the ultimate destination when you want to do manual routing. 請注意，關閉通道處理站時，會關閉此通道處理站所建立的所有通道。Note that any channels created by this channel factory are closed when the channel factory is closed. 如需定址的討論，請參閱[位址](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/endpoint-addresses.md)主題。For a discussion of addressing, see the [Addresses](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/endpoint-addresses.md) topic.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !TChannel CreateChannel(class System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress to) cil managed
Public Function CreateChannel (to As EndpointAddress) As TChannel

span.span: The that provides the location of the service.

summary.span: 建立指向指定之端點位址的指定型別通道。

span.span: Creates a channel of a specified type to a specified endpoint address.

returns.span: 指定之端點位址的 型別通道。

span.span: A channel of type to the specified endpoint address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 多載來區分最初傳送訊息的目標位址以及當您想要執行手動路由傳送時的最終目的地。Use the overload to distinguish the address to which the message is initially sent from the ultimate destination when you want to do manual routing. 請注意，關閉通道處理站時，會關閉此通道處理站所建立的所有通道。Note that any channels created by this channel factory are closed when the channel factory is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public TChannel CreateChannel (System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress to, Uri via);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !TChannel CreateChannel(class System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress to, class System.Uri via) cil managed
Public Function CreateChannel (to As EndpointAddress, via As Uri) As TChannel

span.span: The that provides the location of the service.

param.name: via
param.span: 包含訊息傳送之目標傳輸位址的 。

span.span: The that contains the transport address to which the message is sent.

summary.span: 建立指定之端點位址的特定型別通道以及訊息傳送的目標傳輸位址。

span.span: Creates a channel of a specified type to a specified endpoint address and transport address to which messages are sent.

returns.span: 指定之端點位址的 型別通道和傳輸位址。

span.span: A channel of type to the specified endpoint address and transport address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `via` 指定的傳輸位址就是當訊息要傳送到某個其他遠端位址的途中，一開始應該先傳送的位置 (該遠端位址是由服務所在的 `to` 所指定)。The transport address specified by the `via` is the location to which a message should initially be sent on its way to some other remote address specified by the `to` at which the service is located. 在大部分的網際網路情況下，`via` URI 與服務最終 位址的 `to` 相同。In most Internet scenarios, the `via` URI is the same as the of the final `to` address of the service. 當您想要執行某種手動路由傳送時，應該要區分這兩個位址。You only distinguish between these two addresses when you want to do some kind of manual routing. 請注意，關閉通道處理站時，會關閉此通道處理站所建立的所有通道。Note that any channels created by this channel factory are closed when the channel factory is closed. 如需定址的討論，請參閱[位址](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/endpoint-addresses.md)主題。For a discussion of addressing, see the [Addresses](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/endpoint-addresses.md) topic.
